name: Spirit Llama
description:
A short game about a virtual pet llama who finds the world has more to offer.

How to play:

  • Click "run game" then hit enter on the title screen to continue.
  • The arrow keys can get you through the whole game.
  • Interact with everything. If you can click an item or NPC multiple times, do so until the dialog repeats.

Made for the Bitsy Virtual Pet game jam.
